item.title: Top reasons to use Canva and grow your Business
item.description: When your business enters the web-based media domain, you need the engagement of your targeted audience Creating simple and boring graphics won’t make much effect on your business, that’s for sure.
item.author: rabby.mohiuddin@gmail.com (Golam Mohiuddin)

item.title: Browser DOM is faster than Virtual DOM!!
item.description: Coding efficiency makes the DOM slower or faster. The DOM performance depends on how less you use the DOM..Regular browser dom is as fast as virtual dom
item.author: rabby.mohiuddin@gmail.com (Golam Mohiuddin)
